txt.en: 'Ah, you've returned!\n\n'Perhaps today you will have better luck seeing 'An Ode to Old Bloodtusk.' I look forward to hearing what you have to say about it!.'

'You saw one of our performances! What did you think of 'An Ode to Old Bloodtusk?'

'Oh, I see. Yes, some of the actors have been having...difficulties. 

'Perhaps you would come back tomorrow, I'm sure we will be back on schedule by then.'
'Have you attended one of the performances yet?'

A hobbit working for the G.L.O.B.E. has asked you to attend a showing of 'An Ode to Old Bloodtusk' and return with your thoughts.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Attend a performance in the Frostbluff Theatre
Attend a performance in the Frostbluff Theatre.
Speak with the hobbit outside the Frostbluff Theatre in Winter-home.\n\nYou should tell the hobbit about the performance you saw.
